attributes.action: It is against human rights to stop us going to Turkey to visit our families
attributes.additional_details: We are desperate to see our families. We don’t care about sun, sea holidays. We need to be with our families.
attributes.background: Put Turkey in amber list. We cannot afford to stay in government approved hotels for £1750 per person. Please scrap this for the people going to see their families. People can prove that they are going for a family visit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587179
